subject: Re: FW: New Donation Received from Les Reiss

full_threads.body:
Hi Michelle,

Thanks for confirming, we have updated the notification emails, you should received the emails now.

Thanks Joel.

Can all these emails come to friends@wolper.com.au and michellestockley@wolper.com.au

Hi Michelle,

Thanks for confirming,

Please see below:

Donation Form - Admin notification goes to - friends@wolper.com.au

New Membership - Admin Notification goes to - info@wolper.com.au

Renewal Membership - Admin Notification goes to - friends@wolper.com.au

Just confirm. would you like could add "michellestockley@wolper.com.au" to received the admin notification email as well.

I also tested the donation form and it's working.

I receive the receipt but not that admin summary email.

Thanks.

Thanks Joel.

I tried the new membership and the membership renewal forms and both are working and the payments are going through - thanks!

I have received the receipts as the user (1st attached email) but I haven't received the email I usually get as the administrator (2nd attached example).

I find that email useful.

Thank you,

Michelle.

Hi Michelle,

We have cleared the site cache. Can you try again? can you do it in incognito mode as welll?

Thanks Joel,

Now when I try to make a payment using the form at https://wolper.com.au/new-membership I get the following error message:

Hi Michelle,

We have made some updates to the form and made some test. It should be working fine now.

Also we have sent an email regarding the DNS updates stuff as well.

Hi Wolf,



Apologies I know I have received a response to my initial enquiry.

I have just done a test - filled out the online form at https://wolper.com.au/new-membership but I have not received a receipt (as the member) or received notification (as the administrator at Wolper).

No funds have come out of my account and I can't see the payment in Stripe.



Can you please take a look.



Thanks,



Michelle.

Hi Michelle,

It seems that the "admin email notification" is working fine. Admin notification is sending it to friends@wolper.com.au. Can you confirm if this is the correct email?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Good morning Wolf,


When someone makes a donation or renews their membership via the website I receive an email line the one below.

We have received three such payments this month but I haven't received an email. I have rely on these emails for various updates.

We have received the funds.


Could you please take a look? I have checked my spam/junk folder.


Thank you,


Michelle.



MICHELLE STOCKLEY

Marketing Manager, Wolper Jewish Hospital

T: 02 8324 2233 M: 0408 600 969


8 Trelawney Street Woollahra NSW 2025

wolper.com.au
